report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-28837 Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-28837 Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader Vulnerability
text: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a use-after-free within the handling of Doc objects. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.
